---
title: "RECIST & Tumor Assessment"
---

## What is RECIST?
Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors.
Defines objective tumor response categories:
- CR: Complete Response
- PR: Partial Response
- SD: Stable Disease
- PD: Progressive Disease

## CRA Oversight
- Verify imaging dates align with visit windows
- Confirm measurements trace to source imaging
- Ensure central review processes followed

## High-Risk Areas
- Missed imaging windows
- Incorrect target lesion selection
- Missing baseline scans
